collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (29 total Queries, 29 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'
SELECT * FROM `tbl_dclient_c3` WHERE `mtID` = '3' AND `cID` = '2'
SELECT * FROM `tbl_c3` WHERE `mtID` = '3'

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'cr', '<p>Determine the nature and extent of accounting records the client has prepared since the period end which can be reviewed by the auditor. These may include:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>Subsequent interim financial statements;</li> <li>Management accounts;</li> <li>Budgets (to aid review of management accounts for unusual or unexpected items);</li> <li>Nominal ledger, including material journals;</li> <li>Sales and purchase records or invoices (including credit notes);</li> <li>Payroll records;</li> <li>Cashbooks.</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: It is not expected that all records highlighted above will be reviewed – the most appropriate records based on the client’s circumstances should be reviewed.</i></p> <p>Document a review of these records. In particular highlight the date these records have been prepared to and whether this is sufficiently close to the date of the audit report, or whether this work will need to be subsequently revisited.</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'cr', '<p>Review minutes of directors’ / shareholders’ meetings and other committees for the period since the reporting date and document any key items which may require disclosure or adjustment in the financial statements.</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'cr', '<p>Review all entries in ‘sensitive’ nominal ledger accounts, including legal and professional accounts for significant or unusual items and seek appropriate explanations.</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>Document the person(s) with whom subsequent events were discussed and the date of this discussion. </p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Whether there is no overlap between those persons charged with governance and the entity’s management then it will normally be necessary to have discussion with a representative from both bodies.</i></p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>a. The procedures that management have established (if any) to ensure that subsequent events are identified and what issues (if any) management have identified;</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>b. Where management or other meetings have been held, but no minutes are available, enquire about what matters have been discussed;</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>c. Developments regarding any legal claims (for or against the entity); </p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>d. Whether significant changes have been made or are proposed which may require disclosure as a non-adjusting event; </p>\r\n<i>NB: This might include, change in the ultimate controlling party, significant sales or purchases of assets or investments, natural disasters, major litigation or substantial changes in asset prices or foreign exchange rates. </i>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>e. Whether there have been any developments regarding risk areas and contingencies;</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>f. Any evidence of fraud and error being discovered;</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'dc', '<p>g. Significant items identified through the auditors’ review of the client’s records.</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>1. Review the notes of the preplanning meeting with the client, the audit planning memorandum and briefing notes to ensure that any subsequent events noted have been adequately addressed.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>2. Consider whether physical verification work or other audit procedures have indicated that any property, plant and equipment have been destroyed or that operating capabilities have significantly changed since the period end.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>3. Revisit any work conducted on the valuation of intangible fixed assets, property, plant and equipment or investments (including properties). Consider whether any valuations or reports have been received by the client which shows significant variations from the period end values.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>4. Consider whether there have been sales of stock since the period-end that would affect ‘net realisable value’.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>5. Consider whether any further information has been received that would impact on the recognition of revenue / profit on sales contracts.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>6. Consider the implications if any major debtors have become insolvent or if negotiations have been entered into that affect recoverability of debts or if the period-end debts still outstanding are above the performance materiality level.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>7. Consider whether any information has been received in respect of subsidiaries, joint ventures, jointly controlled operations, jointly controlled assets or associates that may impact on the way in which these investments have been treated or the figures included in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>8. Enquire into, or extend previous oral or written enquiries of the entity’s legal advisors concerning litigation, claims or disputes.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>9. Review our practices’ correspondence and tax files / folders for the period after the reporting date for unusual items.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>10. Consider whether disclosure is required of any changes in the tax rates or tax laws enacted or announced since the year end that have significantly affected on either the current or deferred tax liabilities;</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>11. Consider if any of the final journal adjustments require additional disclosure in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>12. Consider whether any events which have occurred, or are likely to occur bring into question the appropriateness of accounting policies used in the financial statements, including the going concern basis of preparation. </p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>13. If there have been any adjusting subsequent events, ensure the materiality and performance materiality calculations are revisited and revised (if necessary), and then reconsider unadjusted audit errors to ensure that the financial statements remain free from material error.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>14. Ensure that an appropriate paragraph is included in the letter of representation.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'air', '{\"sia\":\"have not\",\"seh\":\"N\\/A\",\"ir\":\"N\\/A\",\"tird\":\"2024-12-04\",\"tfrd\":\"2024-08-30\"}', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'cr', '<p>Determine the nature and extent of accounting records the client has prepared since the period end which can be reviewed by the auditor. These may include:</p> <ol type=\"a\"> <li>Subsequent interim financial statements;</li> <li>Management accounts;</li> <li>Budgets (to aid review of management accounts for unusual or unexpected items);</li> <li>Nominal ledger, including material journals;</li> <li>Sales and purchase records or invoices (including credit notes);</li> <li>Payroll records;</li> <li>Cashbooks.</li> </ul> <p><i>NB: It is not expected that all records highlighted above will be reviewed – the most appropriate records based on the client’s circumstances should be reviewed.</i></p> <p>Document a review of these records. In particular highlight the date these records have been prepared to and whether this is sufficiently close to the date of the audit report, or whether this work will need to be subsequently revisited.</p>', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>5. Consider whether any further information has been received that would impact on the recognition of revenue / profit on sales contracts.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>6. Consider the implications if any major debtors have become insolvent or if negotiations have been entered into that affect recoverability of debts or if the period-end debts still outstanding are above the performance materiality level.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>7. Consider whether any information has been received in respect of subsidiaries, joint ventures, jointly controlled operations, jointly controlled assets or associates that may impact on the way in which these investments have been treated or the figures included in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>8. Enquire into, or extend previous oral or written enquiries of the entity’s legal advisors concerning litigation, claims or disputes.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>9. Review our practices’ correspondence and tax files / folders for the period after the reporting date for unusual items.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>10. Consider whether disclosure is required of any changes in the tax rates or tax laws enacted or announced since the year end that have significantly affected on either the current or deferred tax liabilities;</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>11. Consider if any of the final journal adjustments require additional disclosure in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>12. Consider whether any events which have occurred, or are likely to occur bring into question the appropriateness of accounting policies used in the financial statements, including the going concern basis of preparation. </p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_dclient_c3` (`fID`, `cID`, `mtID`, `code`, `type`, `field1`, `field2`, `field3`, `field4`, `field5`, `field6`, `field7`, `field8`, `field9`, `field10`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '3', 'AA3A', 'faf', '<p>13. If there have been any adjusting subsequent events, ensure the materiality and performance materiality calculations are revisited and revised (if necessary), and then reconsider unadjusted audit errors to ensure that the financial statements remain free from material error.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')

Ensure that an appropriate paragraph is included in the letter of representation.</p>', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-12-07 12:20:55')
